snippet: We may not know everything that happened that fateful night on April 15, 1912, but the ambition and folly of the Titanic’s maiden voyage are still with us.
abstract: Editorial reflects on the 100th anniversary of the sinking of the Titanic on April 15, 1912; concludes that while people today may not know everything that happened on that fateful night, the ambition and folly of the ship's maiden voyage still resonate.
lead_paragraph: We may not know everything that happened that fateful night on April 15, 1912, but the ambition and folly of the Titanic’s maiden voyage are still with us.

headline.seo: At Sea on the Titanic a Century Ago
